QuestData.Title: Bringing the Thunder
QuestData.Description:
All of the mogu clans are formidable, to be sure, but it is the Zan-Tien that pose the most direct threat to the Golden Lotus.
Even now, their numbers are amassing outside the Golden Pagoda. Many of our warriors are fresh-faced and inexperienced. They would not withstand a mogu assault for long.
An experienced $c like you could serve to slow them down significantly.
Care to help?
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Zan-Tien mogu in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
